intro: Blend in, hunt your friends, and become the sneakiest animal at the party!
description:
Have a blast hiding, deceiving, and hunting your friends!
Sneaky Claws is a local multiplayer game for 2 to 8 players where you blend in with AI characters to find and eliminate your friends… before they catch you!
Enjoy quick rounds full of fun tension, visual trickery, laughter, and sneaky cartoon animals.
Perfect for all ages, with simple controls, short matches, and loads of humour.
